short_summary: Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Central Heating Plant Boilers - Petawawa, Ontario
description: DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) – PA616451_79075 – Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Central Heating Plant Boilers – Petawawa, Ontario
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Inspection, Testing, and Maintenance of Central Heating Plant Boilers**

**Solicitation Number:** PA616451_79075
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Expired

**Location:**
 - **Region:** Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
 - **Delivery Location:** Petawawa, Ontario

**Government Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Estimated Value:** $2,000,000.00 CAD

**Solicitation Overview:**
The Government of Canada, through Defence Construction Canada (DCC), invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the Inspection, Testing, and Maintenance (ITM) of three (3) central heating plant boilers located in Petawawa, Ontario. This project includes the supply of labour, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary for ITM services, as well as minor repairs. The successful contractor will be required to hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD) of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

**Tender Conditions:**
- **Security Requirements:** The selected contractor must possess a valid DOS and adhere to the security requirements outlined in the tender documents.
- **Estimated Duration:** The work must be completed within 1825 calendar days from the contract award notification.
- **Site Visit:** A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for Wednesday, January 25, 2023, at 10:00 hours local time.

**Tender Submission:**
Bidders must order the tender documents from MERX and obtain any amendments from the same source. Only those bidders whose name appears on the official list of bidders who ordered the tender documents will be considered.

**Notice Contact:**
Stephen Recoskie
PCO@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
Phone: 613-312-0224
Visit the DCC website for contract award results and other information.
